mapper.select: select device_number,time,imei,imsi,lac,ci,longitude,latitude,prov_id,in_time,data_source,city_id,area_id,topic_name from ods_electronic_fence_gqrw_in where time>=#{dateStart} and time < #{dateEnd} order by time desc

select device_number,time,imei,imsi,lac,ci,longitude,latitude,prov_id,in_time,data_source,city_id,area_id,topic_name from ods_electronic_fence_gqrw_out where time>=#{dateStart} and time < #{dateEnd} order by time desc

select device_number,lac,ci,active_time,topic_name,city,base_station,lat,lon,lac_ci from ( select t1.device_number,t1.lac,t1.ci,t1.active_time,t1.topic_name,t2.city,t2.base_station,t2.lat,t2.lon,t2.lac_ci from ( SELECT device_number,lac,ci,active_time,topic_name FROM ods_unicom_person_track WHERE active_time >#{dateStart} and active_time<#{dateEnd} and device_number =#{deviceNumber}) t1 left join ods_base_station_2g3g t2 on t1.ci=t2.ci and t1.lac=t2.lac where t2.lat != '' union all select t3.device_number,t3.lac,t3.ci,t3.active_time,t3.topic_name,t4.city,t4.base_station,t4.lat,t4.lon,t4.lac_ci from ( select device_number,lac,ci,active_time,topic_name from ods_unicom_person_track where active_time >#{dateStart} and active_time<#{dateEnd} and device_number =#{deviceNumber}) t3 left join ods_base_station_4g t4 on t3.ci=t4.ci where t4.lat != '') t5 order by t5.active_time asc;
